live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates. A further update will be provided at 07:05 PT.
60444.summary: Some customers in the Hart Highlands area of Prince George are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
60444.title: Apr 24 - Prince George (Hart Highlands) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

60445.affected_area: Edmonton (Virginia Park, Alberta Avenue, Parkdale, Killarney, Eastwood, Balwin, Delton)
live_updates: Technicians are on site working to resolve this issue. A further update will be provided at 12:25 MT. Thank you for your patience.

Teams have confirmed a power outage is present in the area affecting our equipment. Please refer to your local power company for any updates. Once power is restored, services in the area should begin working. Our next update will be after the power is restored.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
